membership: ENMC - European Network of Maritime Clusters
goals__remit:
The mission of the Malta Maritime Forum is to serve as a common platform for those Malta based entities who are involved in the maritime, logistical and transport sector in Malta. This platform will facilitate communication between the various sectors as well as with Government to assist and promote the development of this industry in general. 
The MMF is an non-governmental organization, operated on a non-profit basis and in accordance with the provisions of Article 38 of the Voluntary Organizations Act ( CAP 492 of the Laws of Malta). VO/1244
relevant_communication: European Network of Maritime Clusters membership, conference hosting and travel expenses to attend meetings and conferences.
